summary:
Aikido is a Japanese martial art created by Morihei Ueshiba. It's unique because it focuses on harmony, not hurting others. The goal is to defend yourself while keeping your opponent safe. Aikido means "the way of unifying life energy."

Practitioners learn throws and locks to redirect attacks. They also use weapons like wooden swords and knives. Aikido comes from an older martial art but has grown into many styles worldwide. It's now practiced in over 140 countries, teaching people to overcome conflict peacefully.
title: Aikido
